abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Nucleus Estates/Second
            Smallholders Project will help the Government's
            objectives for the development of the rubber sector through
            the settlement of poor and landless families on hitherto
            unproductive land while raising rubber output, farm incomes,
            living standards and export incomes. Seven thousand six
            hundred families would settle on 38,000 ha located in Riau
            and Jambi Provinces in Sumatera. Seven thousand five hundred
            ha of existing rubber trees would be replanted, which would
            benefit an additional 3,750 families in the same areas. An
            additional 3,500 ha would be developed for the public sector
            estate PTP IV at Air Molek, Riau. The project also includes
            technical assistance to the Director General of
            Estates/Second Smallholders for project preparation,
            planning and implementation, to the Extension Training
            Center for extension and training in smallholder rubber
            management and to the Director General of Highways for
            project road engineering.
